item.title: CGI Video Production Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented CGI Video Production Specialist to join our team. As a CGI Video Production Specialist, you will be responsible for creating high-quality CGI videos and animations for various projects. Your role will involve working closely with our creative team to bring concepts to life and deliver compelling visuals. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in CGI video production, exceptional attention to detail, and the ability to meet tight deadlines.

   Responsibilities:
   - Collaborate with the creative team to develop CGI video concepts
   - Create and edit high-quality CGI videos and animations
   - Ensure the timely delivery of projects
   - Maintain a strong understanding of industry trends and best practices in CGI video production

   Requirements:
   - Proven experience in CGI video production
   - Proficiency in industry-standard CGI software (e.g., Maya, 3ds Max, Cinema 4D)
   - Strong attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work
   - Excellent communication and collaboration skills
   - Ability to work efficiently and meet deadlines

   If you have a passion for CGI video production and are looking for an exciting opportunity to showcase your skills, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $18.00-$48.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 08:13 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Editing, 3D Animation, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Editing, 3D Animation, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Saudi Arabia
click to apply

item.title: Video into/outro animation - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

I am seeking a skilled animator to create a dynamic and engaging animation for my company logo, which will be used as an intro and outro for our videos. Below is a detailed description of the animation requirements:

1. Logo Elements:
• Two large ‘H’ symbols.
• A dividing line between the ‘H’ symbols.
• The text “Haven Homes” at the bottom.
2. Animation Sequence:
• Initial Fade-In:
• The two large ‘H’ symbols should fade in with a motion effect, making it appear as if one ‘H’ is coming forward and the other is moving backward.
• Dividing Line Slide:
• After the ‘H’ symbols are in place, the dividing line should slide down smoothly into position between the two ‘H’ symbols.
• Text Illumination:
• The text “Haven Homes” at the bottom should start dark and then be illuminated from left to right, creating a glowing effect.
• This illumination should resemble a flashlight shining across the text but with a soft glow, not too bright or harsh.
3. Style and Timing:
• The overall animation should be smooth and professional.

The glowing effect on the text should be subtle and elegant, enhancing the logo without overpowering it.


Posted On: June 30, 2024 07:54 UTC
Category: Visual Effects
Skills:Maxon Cinema 4D, Adobe Photoshop, 2D Logo Reveal, Video Editing, Animated GIF, 3D Animation, NFT Video, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Logo Animation, 3D Logo Reveal, CGI
Skills: Maxon Cinema 4D, Adobe Photoshop, 2D Logo Reveal, Video Editing, Animated GIF, 3D Animation, NFT Video, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Logo Animation, 3D Logo Reveal, CGI
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Seeking Arabic Instagram/Tiktok reels video editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking an arabic speaking video editor who can create simple reels/tiktoks for my channel. I am looking for this quality level of work:

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8jo1rcMaDC/?igsh=MThhb3lrbDFvNDNtbw==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8ZH1AUs8CD/?igsh=cTljeGl6MGNsODQ3


https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8rjbtGIGI-/?igsh=MWF4YnRxenpucWF4cw==



https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8ja8Ensbe7/?igsh=MXFkdjVpc2RteWpkMw==



My channel will be faceless, I will be submitting a script with direction and notes and a voice over in Arabic 30-60 seconds. Your job will be to create the video.


Im just starting out, but I plan to do 3 videos a week and post them. Please share with me your quotation per video basis, and quotation if we work on a contract (longer term) basis. 3 videos a week (12 videos a month) to start with.

I am looking for high attention to detail, and no sloppy or shortcuts.





Budget: $100
Posted On: June 30, 2024 07:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Kuwait
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Anime Analysis YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a talented video editor with a passion for anime? Do you have an eye for detail and the ability to create engaging high-quality content? If so, we want to hear from you!

About Us:
We are a YouTube channel dedicated to in-depth anime analyses. Our content dives deep into the world of anime, providing insights, theories, and reviews that keep our audience engaged and coming back for more. We produce short-form videos about 35 seconds long and long-form videos ranging from 15 to 18 minutes.

Job Requirements:

Strong editing skills with the ability to edit every second of the video to keep the audience engaged.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
A keen understanding of anime and its community.
Ability to provide examples of previous work, preferably in the anime niche.
Attention to detail and a creative mindset.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively.
Responsibilities:

Edit voiceover videos for our anime analysis channel.
Incorporate relevant clips, images, and effects to enhance the content.
Ensure videos are engaging, visually appealing, and professionally edited.
Work closely with the channel owner to understand the vision and style of the content.
Next Steps:
If you’re selected, you’ll be given one short-form video (35 seconds) and one long-form video (15-18 minutes) to edit. You’ll be paid for this task, and it will allow us to check your editing skills.

We look forward to seeing your incredible work and hopefully welcoming you to our team!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$150.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 07:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Motion Graphics, Videography, Animation
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Motion Graphics, Videography, Animation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Creating instagram themepage like Valorgi style video in Dog vertical - Upwork
item.description:
Objective:
Create engaging Instagram Reels in a style similar to Valorgi’s, specifically adapted for the dog niche to build a community of dog owners and lovers. See Valorgi instagram theme page here: https://www.instagram.com/valorgi/reels/

Key Points:

Style Reference: Check out Valorgi’s Instagram Reels to understand the style and pacing. We aim to replicate this aesthetic and editing rhythm but focused on dogs.  Using very premium looking content from other dog creators

Content Theme: All videos should be dog-centric, highlighting fun, emotional, and heartwarming moments with dogs. Think of themes like ‘3 mistakes every dog owner should avoid’, ‘3 foods that are bad for your dog’, or ‘5 signs you can't live without your dog’.

Video Length: Aim for 30 - 90 seconds, optimized for high engagement and repeat views.

Visuals and Effects: Use dynamic cuts, smooth transitions, and include on-screen text that enhances the storytelling without overwhelming the visuals. The overall look should be polished and professional. Often we can use the same audio that Valorgi is using. Very important is that the visuals should illustrate what the script is talking about to keep people's attention.

Audio: Select music and sound effects that are lively and uplifting, syncing well with the video content to enhance the emotional impact.

Call to Action: Each video should end with a subtle call to action, like “Follow for more heartwarming dog tales” or “Share your dog’s story with us”.

Target Audience: Dog owners and lovers, primarily in the age range of 20-55, who enjoy watching and sharing content about dogs.

Deliverables:

Produce a series of 7 Instagram Reels as a pilot phase.
Include draft versions for initial feedback before finalizing each video.Ensure all content is original or properly licensed, and aligns with Instagram’s community guidelines + giving the original creator credits in the caption.

You can find a video that I myself made as a reference here - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1VatBS-JQTsf2LrPKbvQhABcdDp6hZYFG/view?usp=sharing

Timeline:
7 - 10 reels per week
Drafts due in one week from project start.
Final versions due one week after feedback on drafts.

Budget:

TBD based on proposed rates and estimated hours.


Budget: $15
Posted On: June 30, 2024 07:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Scripting
Skills: Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Scripting
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Picture Slideshow - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create picture slideshows similar to one we already have. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing videos from pictures, adding transitions, music, and effects to create visually stunning slideshows. The project will involve taking a set of pictures and turning them into a dynamic and engaging video presentation.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit pictures and create a cohesive video slideshow
  - Add transitions, music, and effects for a visually appealing presentation
  - Ensure smooth and seamless transitions between pictures
  - Deliver the final video in the desired format

  Requirements:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of video editing techniques and best practices
  - Attention to detail and ability to work with tight deadlines

  If you have a creative eye and can bring pictures to life through video editing, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of your previous work when applying.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 30, 2024 07:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Photo Slideshow, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Photo Slideshow, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
